channel.title: Comments on: The Yahoo Service I Use The Most

item.title: By: Scott Barlow
item.dc:creator: Scott Barlow
item.description:
I use Gmail the most and Google for searches. But Flickr, Yahoo! Finance, and Yahoo! News after that - all on a daily basis. Now that you brought up battles, it's interesting how I just use what works for me
On the mobile side of things, I use my 8830 BB for corporate email the most, then while on the go, Gmail, Google Maps (GPS-enabled), and last, the 'Yahoo! Go' app to access Flickr.
I'm kinda rooting for Yahoo! as the new underdog now.
item.content:encoded:
I use Gmail the most and Google for searches. But Flickr, Yahoo! Finance, and Yahoo! News after that – all on a daily basis. Now that you brought up battles, it’s interesting how I just use what works for me

On the mobile side of things, I use my 8830 BB for corporate email the most, then while on the go, Gmail, Google Maps (GPS-enabled), and last, the ‘Yahoo! Go’ app to access Flickr.

I’m kinda rooting for Yahoo! as the new underdog now.
